DOC.brief_title: Genotype Phenotype Registry : Enrollment Normal Control Subjects Current Future Research
DOC.detailed_description: The registry collection volunteer willing participate control subject research study . Control subject people specific disease ; therefore serve critical role comparison people disease characteristic study . Once register , participant notify study may able participate control . Participation require : 1. sign consent form 2. answer short health survey 3. provide DNA sample via mouthwash kit The registry allow scientist select study participant base whether specific genetic change may relevant disease investigation . Having ability access control need extremely valuable resource speed scientific discovery .
